ValidationRule.description: Validate that values in Context Section and Source Object fields are properly dependent
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( AND ( ISPICKVAL( cgcloud__Object__c , "Order"), NOT(CONTAINS(cgcloud__Mobility_Entity__c, "Order")) ), AND ( ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Object__c, "Custom"), NOT(CONTAINS(cgcloud__Mobility_Entity__c,"Item")), NOT(CONTAINS(cgcloud__Mobility_Entity__c,"Main")) ), AND ( OR ( ISPICKVAL( cgcloud__Object__c , "Customer"), ISPICKVAL( cgcloud__Object__c , "Product") ), TEXT(cgcloud__Object__c) != cgcloud__Mobility_Entity__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid Context Section and Source Mapping. Try again with a valid combination.
